channel.title: Drawing on Draw with Yami
channel.description: Recent content in Drawing on Draw with Yami

item.title: Humble Beginnings
item.description: Humble Beginnings I drew a little bit of anime as a kid (as most nerds do at one point or another) and found it to be pretty fun – so I thought, what the heck maybe I can do drawing more seriously. It’s relaxing and it’s something I can do to wind down at the end of the day. Plus, if I stick with it, there’s a chance I’ll eventually, hopefully be able to draw something I’m proud of.
